test.question: Which of the followings means more to you?
test.op1: I enjoy more when my partner held my hand in public.
test.op2: When I am busy, my partner thinks of me and helped me with house chores without asking.

test.question: Which of the followings means more to you?
test.op1: It makes me feel more loved when I receive a surprise gift from my partner.
test.op2: There is nothing better than just staying next to my partner and enjoy our private time.
